## Resource to Report
**Resource Name:** (Name of the resource as it appears in `resources.md`)

**Current URL:** (The URL currently listed in `resources.md`)

**Issue Description:**
(Explain why you believe this resource is outdated, inaccurate, or problematic. For example: link is broken, information is incorrect, resource has moved, etc.)

## Correct/Updated Information (if available)
**Updated URL:** (If the resource has moved to a new URL, provide it here)

**Updated Description:** (If the description needs to be corrected, provide the accurate description)

**Other Changes:** (Any other changes needed, such as target audience or type of support)

## Additional Notes
(Any supporting evidence, screenshots, or references that can help verify the issue.)

---

**Note:** If you have the correct information and would like to submit a correction, you can fork the repository, edit `resources.md` accordingly, and open a pull request linking to this issue (e.g., "Closes #ISSUE_NUMBER").
